author: rjung
msg: Even if a vhost has private JkMounts, it should not always
inherit the mounts from the global server. Only inherit

author: rjung
msg: Merge is always done before post_config, so we
can use jk_mount_copy_all to set mountcopy during merge,
JkMountCopy All should be weaker than JkMountCopy Off,
i.e. a vhost with JkMountCopy Off should not inherit
the mounts, even if JkMountCopy All is globally set.

author: clombart
msg: apply patch procided by Padraic Hannon for issue JCR-1043

msg: Submitted by: David Jones; heavily modified by trawick
